sentences.sentence: On matrimony he had never once said a word.
sentences.translation: 关于婚姻的事，他从来就没有说过一个字。

sentences.sentence: Prince William hovers on the brink of matrimony - a year or so before his 30th birthday.
sentences.translation: 离30岁生日还有一年左右，威廉王子即将开始他的婚姻生活。

sentences.sentence: My boyfriend and I had been dating for almost a year and both felt the time was right to join our lives together in holy matrimony.
sentences.translation: 我和男友交往已快一年，我们都感到是携手步入神圣的婚姻殿堂的时候了。
